DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent height measured in feet.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The vertical distance from the base to the top of an individual.

Property.preferredDefinition: The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.

Concepts.definition: The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 7/6/23 used in an NCI Standard CDE; chg RS to Standard and txfr ownership to NCI Standards to support DSS reuse. jk

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Height; the vertical dimension of extension; distance from the base of something to the top._A unit of length defined by the U.S. National Bureau of Standards as 30.48 centimeters. It is equal to 0.3048 meter, 12 inches, or to approximately 0.999998 survey foot.(NCI)_A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::9: A unit of length defined by the U.S. National Bureau of Standards as 30.48 centimeters. It is equal to 0.3048 meter, 12 inches, or to approximately 0.999998 survey foot.(NCI)

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A traditional unit of length defined by the U.S. National Bureau of Standards as 30.48 centimeters. It is equal to 0.3048 meter, 12 inches, or to approximately 0.999998 survey foot.
